dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.root.ch.EntitySpecCharValueUse
dataStructure.description:
A use of the CharacteristicSpecificationValue by an EntitySpecification to which additional properties (attributes) apply or override the properties of similar properties contained in CharacteristicSpecificationValue.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: EntitySpecCharValueUse

child.name: _default
child.description:
Indicates if the value is the default value for a characteristic.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: _default

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time for which the use of the CharacteristicSpecificationValue is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor
